original: ngag gi 'grel pa/_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gang na yod
analyzed: ngag gi 'grel pa/_dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gang na yod
translated: Homage to glorious Samantabhadra!🔽The eight aspects of the existence of the ultimate heart essence

original: pa'i rnam pa brgyad du shes/_/gang la ci 'dra de nyid sres pa bzhin/_/rnam
analyzed: pa'i rnam pa brgyad du shes/_/gang la ci 'dra de nyid sres pa bzhin/_/rnam
translated: are to be understood as follows:🔽Just as the four aspects of the essence of being are summarized🔽in the four distinctions,🔽so the eight are summarized in the six,

original: bzhi'i bye brag drug las brgyad dkyil nas/_/don dam snying po de la phyag 'tshhal
analyzed: bzhi'i bye brag drug las brgyad dkyil nas/_/don dam snying po de la phyag 'tshhal

original: lo/_/zhes bya ba gang dang de gnyis rtag tu 'brel te/_gang nang yod na snying
analyzed: lo/_/zhes bya ba gang dang de gnyis rtag tu 'brel te/_gang nang yod na snying
translated: The essence of being is always connected with the ultimate heart essence in two ways:🔽In terms of its location, the ultimate heart essence is present in the center of the heart.

analyzed: gi dkyil na yod/_du yod na rtsha'i dngas ma brgyad yod pa/_de'i dkyil na
translated: In terms of its number, there are eight aspects of the essence of being present.🔽In the center of those, there are three major aspects of the essence of being.

analyzed: dngas ma chen po gsum yod/_de'i dkyil na lnga yod pa de'i dkyil na thig le
translated: In the center of those, there are five aspects. In the center of those, there is a bindu.

analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bzhugs pa de la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/gang na yod na snying khong
translated: Where is it? In the center of the empty heart.

analyzed: stong gi dkyil na rtsha'i dngas ma rtsha bran rgyus pa blad pa 'dra ba brgyad yod pa la/ gsum chos nyid kyi rtsha/_gcig ye shes kyi rtsha/_gsum rang rgyud kyi rtsha/

original: bcu dus bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs pa yang thig le de nyid yin/_sku gsung
analyzed: bcu dus bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs pa yang thig le de nyid yin/_sku gsung
translated: That is also the perfection of the maṇḍala of the ten directions and four times.

original: thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyang de nyid yin/_'on kyang mgrin pa'i thig le'i
analyzed: thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyang de nyid yin/_'on kyang mgrin pa'i thig le'i
translated: The bindu is also the body, speech, mind, qualities, and activities.

original: 'od des bde ba chen po'i thig le 'od du zhu nas spyi blugs su gyur pas bde ba
analyzed: 'od des bde ba chen po'i thig le 'od du zhu nas spyi blugs su gyur pas bde ba

analyzed: chen po'i rang bzhin du gyur te/_khams gsum thams cad so sor ma yin par
translated: Since the nature of great bliss becomes the nature of the three realms,🔽the pristine consciousness arises in the space of the dhātu.

original: gyur pas ye shes nam mkha'i shugs su skye ste/_chos kyi skur gyur pa la/_kun
analyzed: gyur pas ye shes nam mkha'i shugs su skye ste/_chos kyi skur gyur pa la/_kun
translated: Since the dharmakāya arises, all the buddhas of the three times🔽and the ten directions are the nature of the dharmakāya.

analyzed: gyi dngos por bdag gyur pas zhes bya'o/_/de ltar rnal 'byor pa chos kyi skur
translated: Since the yogi/ni has become the entity of the dharmakaya,

translated: the empowerment of the supreme is conferred upon him/her.

original: nyid la gnas pa gnas nyid la/_/de la gnyis rdzogs lhun gyis grub/_/thams
analyzed: nyid la gnas pa gnas nyid la/_/de la gnyis rdzogs lhun gyis grub/_/thams
translated: The two are perfect in the state of abiding,🔽and everything is the great ornament of that.

analyzed: cad de'i rgyan du che/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rnal 'byor gong ma ltar las su rung

original: gsang ba'i thigs pa'i man ngag gi 'grel pa

analyzed: pa de la lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gong ma lta bus dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o/_/de

analyzed: cad dkyil 'khor du gyur pas de'i longs spyod du ma gyur pa 'am/_rgyan du ma

analyzed: ma'i sems can sgrol ba yi/_/rnal 'byor chen po 'od ldan spyod/_/zhes bya ba
